quests.desc: Welcome to TextWorld! Here is how to play! First off, try to move east. Following that, try to go to the east. Then, make sure that the portal inside the bar is wide open. And then, head north. And then, venture east. Then, try to head east. If you can get around to doing that, move north. And then, make an effort to go to the west. And then, try to go to the north. Next, recover the fly larva from the floor of the study. Alright, thanks!

infos.name: study
infos.desc:
You arrive in a study. A typical kind of place. You begin to take stock of what's in the room.



There is an unblocked exit to the east. There is an unguarded exit to the north. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: shower
infos.desc:
You're now in the shower. You try to gain information on your surroundings by using a technique you call 'looking.'

 You can see [if c_0 is locked]a locked[else if c_0 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] usual looking safe here.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The safe contains [a list of things in the c_0]. Something scurries by right in the corner of your eye. Probably nothing.[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] The safe is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an unguarded exit to the north. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: cookhouse
infos.desc:
You arrive in an ordinary kind of place. That is to say, you're in a cookhouse.

 You see [if c_1 is locked]a locked[else if c_1 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] American chest.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The American chest contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] The American chest is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the north. There is an unblocked exit to the south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: laundry place
infos.desc:
You've just shown up in a laundry place. You start to take note of what's in the room.

 You see a rack. The rack is ordinary.[if there is something on the s_0] On the rack you can make out [a list of things on the s_0]. Classic TextWorld.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0] But there isn't a thing on it. Oh! Why couldn't there just be stuff on it?[end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the north. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: studio
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in the studio.

 Look out! It's a- oh, never mind, it's just a chair. [if there is something on the s_1]On the chair you can make out [a list of things on the s_1].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1]But the thing is empty.[end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the east.

infos.name: bar
infos.desc:
You arrive in a bar. A normal one. Okay, just remember what you're here to do, and everything will go great.



 There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading north. There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading west.

infos.name: scullery
infos.desc:
You arrive in a scullery. A normal kind of place. The room seems oddly familiar, as though it were only superficially different from the other rooms in the building.

 You can make out a chest.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The chest contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] What a letdown! The chest is empty![end if]

 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading east. There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading west.

infos.name: bathroom
infos.desc:
You are in a bathroom. It seems to be pretty ordinary here. Let's see what's in here.

 You make out a Canadian limited edition locker. Wow, isn't TextWorld just the best?[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The Canadian limited edition locker contains [a list of things in the c_3]. I mean, just wow! Isn't TextWorld just the best?[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] The Canadian limited edition locker is empty, what a horrible day![end if] You scan the room, seeing a shelf. The shelf is standard.[if there is something on the s_2] On the shelf you can make out [a list of things on the s_2]. Wow! Just like in the movies![end if][if there is nothing on the s_2] But the thing hasn't got anything on it.[end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading east. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: restroom
infos.desc:
You are in a restroom. An usual kind of place. You decide to just list off a complete list of everything you see in the room, because hey, why not?



You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: kitchen
infos.desc:
Look around you. Take it all in. It's not every day someone gets to be in a kitchen. Okay, just remember what you're here to do, and everything will go great.

 If you haven't noticed it already, there seems to be something there by the wall, it's a spherical box. There's something strange about this being here, but you can't put your finger on it.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The spherical box contains [a list of things in the c_4].[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] The spherical box is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: spare room
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in the spare room.



There is an unblocked exit to the north. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: canteen
infos.desc:
You've just walked into a canteen.

 You can see a lavender scented safe.[if c_5 is open and there is something in the c_5] The lavender scented safe contains [a list of things in the c_5]. Suddenly, you bump your head on the ceiling, but it's not such a bad bump that it's going to prevent you from looking at objects and even things.[end if][if c_5 is open and the c_5 contains nothing] The lavender scented safe is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the east. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: office
infos.desc:
You find yourself in an office. An usual kind of place.



You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: garage
infos.desc:
You arrive in a garage. A standard one. The room is well lit.



There is an unguarded exit to the north. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: kitchenette
infos.desc:
Well how about that, you are in a place we're calling a kitchenette.

 You make out a case. Something scurries by right in the corner of your eye. Probably nothing.[if c_6 is open and there is something in the c_6] The case contains [a list of things in the c_6].[end if][if c_6 is open and the c_6 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the east. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: workshop
infos.desc:
You've entered a workshop. You decide to just list off a complete list of everything you see in the room, because hey, why not?

 You make out [if c_7 is locked]a locked[else if c_7 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] box close by.[if c_7 is open and there is something in the c_7] The box contains [a list of things in the c_7].[end if][if c_7 is open and the c_7 contains nothing] The box is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

 There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading south. There is an unguarded exit to the east. There is an unguarded exit to the north. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: cellar
infos.desc:
You've entered a cellar.



There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an unblocked exit to the north.

infos.name: dish-pit
infos.desc:
I just think it's great that you've just entered a dish-pit.

 Were you looking for a table? Because look over there, it's a table. The table is ordinary.[if there is something on the s_3] On the table you make out [a list of things on the s_3].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3] But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of trash.[end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: cookery
infos.desc:
You arrive in a cookery. A normal one. You begin to take stock of what's in the room.

 You see a bowl. The bowl is usual.[if there is something on the s_4] On the bowl you see [a list of things on the s_4].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4] But the thing is empty.[end if] You see a gleam over in a corner, where you can see a plate. [if there is something on the s_5]You see [a list of things on the s_5] on the plate.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_5]Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though. You swear loudly.[end if]

There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: laundromat
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a laundromat. A standard kind of place.

 You see [if c_8 is locked]a locked[else if c_8 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] type 9 chest.[if c_8 is open and there is something in the c_8] The type 9 chest contains [a list of things in the c_8]. There's something strange about this thing being here, but you don't have time to worry about that now.[end if][if c_8 is open and the c_8 contains nothing] What a letdown! The type 9 chest is empty![end if] You make out [if c_9 is locked]a locked[else if c_9 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] locker here.[if c_9 is open and there is something in the c_9] The locker contains [a list of things in the c_9].[end if][if c_9 is open and the c_9 contains nothing] The locker is empty! What a waste of a day![end if] You can see a bench. [if there is something on the s_6]On the bench you can see [a list of things on the s_6].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_6]But the thing is empty, unfortunately.[end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the south.

objective: You are now playing a fast paced episode of TextWorld! Here is how to play! First stop, go to the east. After that, take a trip east. Then, make sure that the portal is open. After that, try to go north. And then, make an effort to move east. Okay, and then, head east. After that, make an attempt to head north. Then, attempt to go to the west. And then, attempt to move north. After that, retrieve the fly larva from the floor of the study. And once you've done that, you win!
